meanings.definition: In a manner related to the use of herbicides.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed the field herbicidally to kill the weeds.
meanings.sent2: The herbicide was applied herbicidally to ensure effective weed control.
meanings.sent3: The weeds trembled as the herbicide approached herbicidally.
meanings.sent4: The herbicide worked herbicidally, wiping out any unwanted plants in its path.
meanings.sent5: The herbicide acted herbicidally, swiftly eliminating the invasive species.

meanings.definition: Having the properties of a herbicide.
meanings.sent1: The herbicidally treated area showed no signs of weed growth.
meanings.sent2: The herbicidally resistant plants thrived despite the chemical treatment.
meanings.sent3: The herbicidally enhanced soil yielded a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent4: The herbicidally modified crops were designed to withstand harsh conditions.
meanings.sent5: The herbicidally altered plants exhibited remarkable resilience to external threats.
